author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Villars Holding FY Consolidated Net Profit Jumps At CHF 26.1 Mln
text:
April 18 (Reuters) - Villars Holding SA:
* FY EBIT FOR THE GROUP UP AT CHF 2.4 MILLION, +2.7 PCT * FY NET PROFIT FOR THE GROUP AT CHF 26.1 MILLION, +809.7 Pct
* TO PROPOSE DIVIDEND OF CHF 38.00 PER SHARE (SPECIAL DIVIDEND CHF 30.00/SHR AND ORDINARY DIVIDEND CHF 8.00/SHR)
* SEES FOR 2018 A SLIGHT INCREASE IN THE GROUPâ€™S SALES
Source text - bit.ly/2qFsXFK
